name: Arctic Survivor
description:
This game will bring you to the abandoned arctic ocean. As a survivor, your goal is to find a way home. You are the only one in this hostile environment. 

The goal in every level is to step on all ice (hexagon) tiles and let them disappear under the water surface. Some tiles need more steps on them (they are darker). The condition to win is to step on the last simple tile left. There is no time pressure to plan your way. You have an unlimited count of undo steps to correct the mistakes. 

The game has two modes right now:

  1. Campaign - This campaign consists of 100 levels with increasing difficulty. It is hard to finish the whole campaign. You can compete with your friends or other players who will be more successful.
  2. Random - the game will generate a random level with the selected difficulty

Enjoy your time in this frozen arctic environment :-)
